jobDescription: The Candidate selected will should start on May 2018. We are looking to hire a Data Analyst to join IB services. He/she will take the responsibility for managing our master data set, developing reports & dashboards, enhance and automate them. The Data Report Analyst is responsible for the daily execution of reports critical to ensuring customer satisfaction, report creation based on gaps identified in the day-to-day activities of the business, data analysis to resolve customer or quoting related issues, and report to management. There is an additional component that involves management of internal and external customer relationships and deliverables as it relates to data and reporting.  This can include driving customer requests to resolution, managing customer expectations, and driving regularly scheduled customer meetings. As the first point of contact when customers encounter data or reporting problems, the Data and Report Analyst has a key role in establishing Vmware, IB services credibility as a Best in Class company. There is a high level of day-to-day interaction with internal and external customers that require a high degree of accountability and timeliness in responses and updates.
